snippet: Havre de Grace, the reigning Horse of the Year, sold for $10 million at the Fasig-Tipton November sale in Lexington, Ky.
abstract: Havre de Grace, reigning Horse of the Year, sells for $10 million at the Fasig-Tipton November sale in Lexington, Ky.
lead_paragraph: Havre de Grace, the reigning Horse of the Year, sold for $10 million at the Fasig-Tipton November sale in Lexington, Ky.

headline.seo: Havre de Grace Race Horse Is Sold for $10 Million
